001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers;
002
003import java.math.BigInteger;
004import java.util.Comparator;
005
006public interface JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> {
007
008    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Rational<BigInteger>> RATIONAL_BIGINT = new RationalBigIntegerSupport();
009    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Rational<Long>> RATIONAL_LONG = new RationalLongSupport();
010    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Rational<Integer>> RATIONAL_INT = new RationalIntegerSupport();
011    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Double> DOUBLE = new DoubleSupport();
012    JavaNumberTypeSupport<Float> FLOAT = new FloatSupport();
013
014    String name();
015
016    N[] createArray(int length);
017
018    N[][] createArrayOfArrays(int rows, int columns);
019
020    N multiply(N first, N second);
021
022    N divide(N first, N second);
023
024    N add(N first, N second);
025
026    default N substract(N first, N second) {
027        return add(first, multiply(minusOne(), second));
028    }
029
030    default N negate(N value) {
031        return multiply(minusOne(), value);
032    }
033
034    N minusOne();
035
036    N one();
037
038    N zero();
039
040    default N inverse(N value) {
041        return divide(one(), value);
042    }
043
044    default boolean isZero(N value) {
045        return equals(zero(), value);
046    }
047
048    default boolean isOne(N value) {
049        return equals(one(), value);
050    }
051
052    boolean equals(N first, N second);
053
054    boolean greaterThan(N first, N second);
055
056    default boolean positive(N value) {
057        return greaterThan(value, zero());
058    }
059
060    default boolean negative(N value) {
061        return greaterThan(zero(), value);
062    }
063
064    N squareRoot(N value);
065
066    default N absolute(N value) {
067        return greaterThan(zero(), value) ? multiply(minusOne(), value) : value;
068    }
069
070    N valueOf(double value);
071
072    Comparator<N> comparator();
073
074}
